title: DEMOCRACY, DISCORD, & IMAGINATION With Robert Talisse
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: Robert Talisse returns to the podcast to discuss his latest book - Sustaining democracy. We also discuss liberalism and the role of imagination in politics (and this time we agree!)
